title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Digital Storytelling for Improving Scientific and Creative Thinking Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can generate three or more visual representations (diagrams, sketches, etc.) to solve scientific problems.
Learners apply divergent thinking to present at least five alternative ideas on a given scientific topic.
Learners create a 3-minute storyboard linking scientific concepts using digital storytelling tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
